byline: Steve Gardner, Queena Kim, Stacey Vanek Smith, Bruce Johnson, Mark Garrison, Sam Beard, Duncan Crawford, Adrienne Hill and David Brancaccio
teaser: In Turkey, Prime Minister Erdogan has lashed out against the business community for supporting protesters. People in their 20s are often stuck in part-time and temporary jobs. How does the loss of income in their first working years affect the rest of their life?. And the NSA surveillance story has been good to one author: George Orwell.

How does the loss of income in their first working years affect the rest of their life?. And the NSA surveillance story has been good to one author: George Orwell.
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, June 12, 2013
